text: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

translation.en: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah]
translation.id: Mereka berkata, "Sesungguhnya kami dahulu, sewaktu berada di tengah-tengah keluarga kami merasa takut (akan diazab)
